/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the urban landscape. The street, teeming with life, stretches out below, flanked by buildings on both sides. These structures, predominantly red and white, rise high into the clear blue sky, punctuated by a smattering of trees interspersed between the buildings. The street itself is a hive of activity, with cars and buses moving along its length, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The image is bathed in the light of a sunny day, casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings.
